nodes.label: require ! (ctx . accounts . authority_030 . is_signer , CustomError :: MissingSigner) ;
let price = ctx . accounts [market_acc_030] . listed . remove (& ctx . accounts [nft_acc_030] . mint) . ok_or (CustomError :: InvalidOwner) ? ;
* * ctx . accounts . seller_030 . to_account_info () . try_borrow_mut_lamports () ? += price ;
let old_bal = ctx . accounts [authority_030] . to_account_info () . lamports () ;
* * ctx . accounts [authority_030] . to_account_info () . try_borrow_mut_lamports () ? = old_bal . checked_sub (price) . ok_or (CustomError :: Underflow) ? ;
msg ! ("Purchased NFT: {:?} @ {}" , ctx . accounts [nft_acc_030] . mint , price) ;
